mapper.sql: SELECT userId, followId, relation, confirm FROM follow_tb
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO follow_tb(userId, followId, relation, confirm) VALUES (#{userId}, #{followId}, #{relation}, #{confirm,typeHandler=BooleanToYnHandler})
mapper.delete: DELETE follow_tb WHERE (userId=#{userId} AND followId=#{followId}) OR (userId=#{followId} AND followId=#{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT userId, followId, relation, confirm FROM follow_tb WHERE userId = #{userId} AND confirm ='Y' AND followId IN (SELECT userId FROM follow_tb WHERE followId=#{userId} AND confirm='Y')
